page.title: 19Leisure in Royston
page.content: There are lots of things to do for people of all ages. A lot of children are brownies,cubs, guides or scouts.These meet in schools and so do the youth clubs. People can play many sports:rugby, football, cricket, hockey, badminton and tennis. A B.M.X. track opened last year.In summer, many people go swim- ming at the'Green plunge', which is an open air pool.In winter people go to letchworth to swim. There is one cinema, which cinema _ goers thought good value. The library is on fish hill. The churches and he community centre have clubs of differ- ent kinds.Most people we questroned were satisfied with the leisure facilities, though some would like an indoor pool, a riding school, ice and roller-skating rinks and squash courts.
